item.title: 科学家们揭示了一个惊人的发现：一条 "非常奇特 "的 2.4 亿年前的 "中国龙 "化石。
item.description:
Scientists have revealed a remarkable discovery of a “very strange” 240 million-year-old “Chinese dragon” fossil. https://t.co/rSqfeejSjA

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 周一，布鲁塞尔街头的农民们点燃了轮胎，因为欧盟农业部长们正在举行会议，寻求办法解决抗议者们对来自欧盟标准无需遵守的国家的廉价进口产品所带来的竞争的担忧。
item.description:
Farmers set fire to tires on the streets of Brussels on Monday as the EU's agriculture ministers met in search of ways to address the protesters’ concerns on competition from cheap imports from countries where the EU's standards do not have to be met. https://t.co/sHDJOv8AhP pic.twitter.com/89mSXivf43

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美国电影艺术与科学学院公布了第 96 届奥斯卡金像奖的首轮颁奖人名单。
item.description:
The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences has announced the first round of presenters for the 96th Academy Awards. https://t.co/NmxX7tvlwl

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 本周末，阿拉巴马州总检察长办公室外发生一起爆炸装置爆炸事件，相关官员表示，调查正在进行中。
item.description:
An investigation is underway after an explosive device was detonated outside the office of the Alabama attorney general this weekend, officials said.

No one was hurt and a motive has not been released. https://t.co/rtyTj5qQUs pic.twitter.com/ElHVS0Xrfb

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一位熟悉内森-韦德的消息人士告诉 @ABC 新闻，法官裁定内森-韦德的前法律合伙人和离婚律师必须在唐纳德-特朗普干涉佐治亚州选举案中重新出庭，就律师-当事人保密特权未涵盖的话题作证。
item.description:
A judge has ruled that Nathan Wade's former law partner and divorce attorney must retake the stand in Donald Trump's Georgia election interference case to testify on topics not covered by attorney-client privilege, sources familiar told @ABC News. https://t.co/2nlthZc2qB

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 官员称，阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的名字曾在初步换俘谈判中被提及，但从未向俄罗斯提出过任何条件。
item.description:
Alexei Navalny's name was raised in preliminary prisoner swap talks, but no offer was ever presented to Russia, official says. https://t.co/nIYccCo658

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 曼哈顿地区检察官阿尔文-布拉格（Alvin Bragg）周一请求法官对前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）实施有限的禁言令，他在纽约被控伪造与支付给成人电影女演员斯托米-丹尼尔斯（Stormy Daniels）封口费有关的商业记录。
item.description:
Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg on Monday asked a judge to impose a limited gag order on former Pres. Donald Trump, who is charged in New York with falsifying business records related to hush money he paid to adult film actress Stormy Daniels.https://t.co/bcRzwhuZrU pic.twitter.com/DIGppi6S2F

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 爱达荷州服刑时间最长的死囚、连环杀手托马斯-尤金-克里奇（Thomas Eugene Creech）定于周三被执行死刑，除非最后一刻获得宽大处理，尽管最不可能的支持者也恳求放过他。
item.description:
Idaho's longest-serving death row inmate, serial killer Thomas Eugene Creech, is scheduled to be executed Wednesday barring a last-minute grant of clemency and despite pleas to spare him from the most unlikely advocates. https://t.co/H28DJBiJHt pic.twitter.com/6byDQLCE1F

— ABC News (@ABC) February 27, 2024

item.title: 爱达荷州服刑时间最长的死刑犯、73 岁的连环杀人犯托马斯-尤金-克里奇（Thomas Eugene Creech）定于周三被执行死刑--尽管最不可能的拥护者也恳求放过他：
item.description:
Idaho's longest-serving death row inmate, 73-year-old serial killer Thomas Eugene Creech, is scheduled to be executed on Wednesday — despite pleas to spare him from the most unlikely advocates.

Here's what to know: https://t.co/YHFZPVcmtL

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 比佛利山警察局表示，上周一所中学报告称，有学生涉嫌参与制作和分享使用人工智能生成的裸体图像，这些图像中出现了同学的面孔，警方正在对此展开调查。
item.description:
The Beverly Hills Police Department said it is investigating after a middle school reported last week that students were allegedly involved in creating and sharing nude images generated using AI that featured the faces of fellow students. https://t.co/GCDnArs94B

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 31年前的今天：一辆载有炸弹的面包车在纽约世贸中心下方爆炸，造成6人死亡，1000多人受伤。
item.description:
ON THIS DAY: 31 years ago, six people were killed and more than 1,000 injured after a van carrying a bomb detonated beneath the World Trade Center in New York City. https://t.co/xTf9tAn1W1 pic.twitter.com/gwVfkXmeOR

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 尼基-黑莉周一表示，尼基-黑莉一直以两位数的优势输给唐纳德-特朗普，但这位前总统迄今在有争议的竞选中只获得了 60% 的选票，这一事实应被视为一个警示信号。
item.description:
Nikki Haley keeps losing to Donald Trump by double digits but the fact that the former president has only managed to reach 60% of the vote in the contested races so far should be taken as a warning sign, Haley said on Monday. https://t.co/SBr3l3rRLH

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统说，他 "希望 "以色列和哈马斯能在下周一之前在加沙实现停火，并补充说，他的国家安全顾问说 "我们就快成功了"。
item.description:
Pres. Biden said he "hopes" to have an Israel-Hamas cease-fire in Gaza by next Monday, adding, his national security advisor says "we're close."

The comments from the president came during a stop at Van Leeuwen’s ice cream shop in New York City. https://t.co/2HIZlzkSd7 pic.twitter.com/70ymmwdyPb

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 美国当局周一表示，在三名越狱囚犯登上他们在加勒比海的船只后失踪的一对美国夫妇拉尔夫-亨德利（Ralph Hendry）和凯西-布兰德尔（Kathy Brandel）很可能已经死亡。
item.description:
An American husband and wife, Ralph Hendry and Kathy Brandel, who went missing after three escaped prisoners boarded their boat in the Caribbean are likely dead, authorities said on Monday. https://t.co/qWpyXdnKUF pic.twitter.com/TVR3TSp9LT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 周一，国会开始返回华盛顿，面临着一个熟悉的困境：国会背靠着墙，因为要在周五的最后期限之前为几个关键的政府项目续拨资金，时间在一分一秒地流逝。
item.description:
Congress started to return to Washington on Monday facing a familiar predicament: its back against the wall as the clock ticks down to renew funding for several key government programs before a Friday deadline. https://t.co/KRDKdn3pF9

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据当局称，一名现役空军士兵周日在华盛顿特区以色列大使馆外自焚身亡。大都会警察局已确认这名男子是来自圣安东尼奥的 25 岁亚伦-布什内尔（Aaron Bushnell）。
item.description:
An active-duty airman has died after authorities say he set himself on fire Sunday outside the Israeli Embassy in Washington, D.C.

The man has been identified by the Metropolitan Police Department as 25-year-old Aaron Bushnell of San Antonio. https://t.co/TMB7OulbMj pic.twitter.com/wIxT8h8Pnx

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 佐治亚州一名 22 岁的护理专业学生在跑步时丧生，这让人们再次关注女性在户外跑步时面临的危险。
item.description:
The death of a 22-year-old nursing student in Georgia who was killed while out for a run has turned a spotlight, once again, on the dangers women face while running outdoors. https://t.co/ScmGwl6fmq

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 当局称，在三名越狱犯登上他们在加勒比海的船只后失踪的一对美国夫妻很可能已经死亡。

An American husband and wife who went missing after three escaped prisoners boarded their boat in the Caribbean are likely dead, authorities say. https://t.co/gpA9ytWzVM

item.title: 特朗普白宫前顾问彼得-纳瓦罗（Peter Navarro）要求联邦上诉法院允许他在就藐视国会罪提起上诉期间继续留在监狱外。
item.description:
Former Trump White House adviser Peter Navarro has asked a federal appeals court to let him remain out of prison while he appeals his contempt of Congress conviction. https://t.co/rcI27IpELV

item.title: 前联邦调查局线人亚历山大-斯米尔诺夫（Alexander Smirnov）被控就拜登总统及其子亨特-拜登（Hunter Biden）一事向局方撒谎，现已还押候审。
item.description:
Alexander Smirnov, the former FBI informant charged with lying to the bureau about Pres. Biden and his son Hunter Biden, was remanded to custody, pending trial. https://t.co/YR3uG3PZpT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 白宫周一宣布，拜登总统将于周四第二次访问美墨边境，再次推动国会通过一项两党边境协议。
item.description:
Pres. Biden will make his second visit to the U.S.-Mexico border on Thursday to make another push for Congress to pass a bipartisan border deal, the White House announced Monday. https://t.co/X94DlPja2R pic.twitter.com/zbPBQniftY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 西弗吉尼亚州众议院通过了一项法案，将取消对声称宗教豁免者的学校疫苗接种要求，但仅限于部分学校。
item.description:
The West Virginia House of Delegates passed a bill that will eliminate school vaccine requirements for those who claim religious exemptions, but only for some schools. https://t.co/LIGowTzI47

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国国务院发言人称，过去几天以色列人质谈判取得了 "进展"，但补充说，目前还不清楚哈马斯是否会接受最新提议：
item.description:
LATEST: A State Department spokesperson said that there’s been "progress" in Israeli hostage talks over the last few days, but added that it’s unclear whether Hamas would accept the latest proposal.

Read more on the Israel-Hamas conflict: https://t.co/Q5SE7FTSvi

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 根据《老农年鉴》的记载，二月份的满月被称为 "雪月"，因为这个季节通常会下大雪。
item.description:
Stunning timelapse footage shows the Snow Moon passing over San Francisco on Feb. 24.

According to the Old Farmer's Almanac, the full moon in February was dubbed the Snow Moon because of the heavy snow that typically falls during this season. https://t.co/nigb4kxQYN pic.twitter.com/7xP9CKuzeS

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 事态发展：本周末，阿拉巴马州总检察长办公室外发生一起爆炸装置爆炸事件，相关官员表示，调查正在进行中。

item.title: 据当局称，一名 25 岁的现役空军士兵周日在以色列驻华盛顿大使馆外自焚身亡，他自称是对以色列-哈马斯战争的 "极端抗议行为"。
item.description:
An active-duty airman, 25, has died after he set himself on fire Sunday outside the Israeli Embassy in Washington, D.C., in what he described as "an extreme act of protest" over the Israel-Hamas war, authorities say. https://t.co/WtWR2oCrmU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据《综艺》杂志报道，瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）将在下个月的奥斯卡颁奖典礼上演唱《芭比娃娃》中的 "I'm Just Ken"。"I'm Just Ken "获本届奥斯卡最佳原创歌曲提名，由高斯林在影片中演唱。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling will take the Oscars stage next month to perform "I'm Just Ken" from "Barbie," according to Variety.

"I'm Just Ken" is nominated for best original song at this year's Oscars and is performed by Gosling in the film. https://t.co/4w8noWvW6R pic.twitter.com/TM3eZKYaP3

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据《综艺》杂志报道，瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）将在下个月的奥斯卡颁奖典礼上演唱《芭比娃娃》中的 "I'm Just Ken"。
item.description:
Ryan Gosling will take the Oscars stage next month to perform "I'm Just Ken" from "Barbie," according to Variety. https://t.co/W7twBGtTAk

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 警方潜水员正在澳大利亚内陆水道搜寻一对同性情侣的尸体，据称这对情侣一周前在悉尼被一名被抛弃的警察用随身携带的手枪射杀。
item.description:
Police divers are searching inland waterways in Australia for the bodies of a same-sex couple allegedly shot dead in Sydney one week earlier by a jilted police officer with his service pistol. https://t.co/tfh4iOa4TF pic.twitter.com/pzCdkbT8io

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024

item.title: 大批民众聚集在加沙代尔拜莱赫（Deir al-Balah）附近的海滩上，等待空投援助包裹。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Large crowds of people gathered on the beach near Deir al-Balah in Gaza as they waited for aid packages to be air-dropped, with footage showing men on boats retrieving the packages.

More here: https://t.co/8tYGIEYI2z pic.twitter.com/xfeInR0MZ5

— ABC News (@ABC) February 26, 2024
